list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a room providing a space out of which one or more other rooms or corridors lead, typically one near the entrance of a public building.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they went into the hotel lobby
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ đã đi vào sảnh khách sạn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a group of people seeking to influence politicians or public officials on a particular issue.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thành viên của sảnh chống phá thai

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: seek to influence (a politician or public official) on an issue.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it is recommending that booksellers lobby their representatives
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nó đang khuyến nghị rằng những người bán sách sảnh đại diện của họ
